ResearchProjectDef.label: gravship basics
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows the construction of basic gravship components.

ResearchProjectDef.label: gravship weaponry
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows the construction of gravship artillery and other defensive systems.

ResearchProjectDef.label: compact workspaces
ResearchProjectDef.description: Unlock smaller variants of workbenches designed for gravships. Compact enough to fit into tight quarters without sacrificing essential functions.

ResearchProjectDef.label: oxygen network
ResearchProjectDef.description: Harvest and store oxygen for use on gravships. Unlocks construction of vacsuits and other survival gear needed to operate in vacuum.

ResearchProjectDef.label: astrofuel refining
ResearchProjectDef.description: Construct astrofuel synthesizers that automatically convert chemfuel into astrofuel for gravship use.

ResearchProjectDef.label: heat dissipation
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows the construction of heat dissipation systems for gravships, including heatsinks and gravheat absorbers to manage thermal buildup during space travel.

ResearchProjectDef.label: gravship living
ResearchProjectDef.description: This research project is focused on living on a gravship, and will unlock a lot of different improvements that will make living on a gravship easier and more accessible.

ResearchProjectDef.label: advanced gravtech
ResearchProjectDef.description: Unlock gravhulks, massive gravships capable of supporting entire colonies. Also allows crafting of gravlite panels, essential ultratech material for advanced gravship construction.
